comment: розовый ужас сделанный из Риззы, бегает по каюте капитана

languages.text: "Тебя зовут Лордом Капитанов — это что-то вроде Владыки Перемен, да? Не терпится принять участие в твоих махинациях, почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}!"

traits.locale_text: "Тебя зовут Лордом Капитанов — это что-то вроде Владыки Перемен, да? Не терпится принять участие в твоих махинациях, почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}!"

languages.text: "You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One."
languages.original_text: "Тебя зовут Лордом Капитанов — это что-то вроде Владыки Перемен, да? Не терпится принять участие в твоих махинациях, почтеннейш{mf|ий|ая}!"

traits.locale_text: "You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, your esteemed self.
"You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, your esteemed self.
"You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One.
"You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One.
"You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One.

languages.text: “他们称呼您为舰长大君，这听起来有点像‘诡变魔君’，是吧？我已经迫不及待想参与您的阴谋了，尊贵的大人。”
languages.original_text: "You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One."

traits.locale_text: “他们称呼您为舰长大君，这听起来有点像‘诡变魔君’，是吧？我已经迫不及待想参与您的阴谋了，尊贵的大人。”

languages.text: « On vous appelle {mf|seigneur|seigneure} des capitaines... C'est un peu comme Duc du Changement, non ? J'ai hâte de prendre part à vos machinations, honorable {mf|sire|dame}. »
languages.original_text: "You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One."

traits.locale_text: « On vous appelle {mf|seigneur|seigneure} des capitaines... C'est un peu comme Duc du Changement, non ? J'ai hâte de prendre part à vos machinations, honorable {mf|sire|dame}. »

languages.text: 「あなたはロード・オヴ・キャプテンって呼ばれてるみたいだけど…それってロード・オヴ・チェンジみたいなものでしょ？あなたの陰謀に加われるのが待ち遠しいよ、誉れ高き者」
languages.original_text: "You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたはロード・オヴ・キャプテンって呼ばれてるみたいだけど…それってロード・オヴ・チェンジみたいなものでしょ？あなたの陰謀に加われるのが待ち遠しいよ、誉れ高き者」

languages.text: «Os llaman Lord de los Capitanes. Es algo parecido a un Señor de la Transformación, ¿no? Tengo ganas de participar en vuestros planes, oh, honorable».
languages.original_text: "You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One."

traits.locale_text: «Os llaman Lord de los Capitanes. Es algo parecido a un Señor de la Transformación, ¿no? Tengo ganas de participar en vuestros planes, oh, honorable».

languages.text: "Man nennt Euch Lord der Captains — das ist so ähnlich wie Herrscher des Wandels, ja? Ich kann es kaum erwarten, mich an Euren Machenschaften zu beteiligen, {mf|Ehrenwertester|Ehrenwerteste}."
languages.original_text: "You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One."

traits.locale_text: "Man nennt Euch Lord der Captains — das ist so ähnlich wie Herrscher des Wandels, ja? Ich kann es kaum erwarten, mich an Euren Machenschaften zu beteiligen, {mf|Ehrenwertester|Ehrenwerteste}.

languages.text: "Size Lordların Kaptanı diyorlar. Bu, Değişim Lordu gibi bir şey mi? Çevirdiğiniz entrikaların bir parçası olmak için sabırsızlanıyorum Saygıdeğer {mf|Beyefendi|Hanımefendi}."
languages.original_text: "You are called the Lord of Captains — this is something like Lord of Change, yes? I can't wait to take part in your machinations, Honourable One."
